Rules and recommendations

Personal attendance of children in primary art schools is banned untilÂ November 20th, 2020.

Singing is an activity with an increased spread of respiratory droplets which is why it is banned for more than 5 people to sing together inside. This applies even if it's related to your profession. The exception applies to singing in preschools and residences (so you can sing at home).
